about_the_game:
Gameplay

Beloved Firefighter is a survival horror game. In order to survive, player must run or hide from the enemies. Combat is not possible and attempts to confront an enemy will result in death. Players can hide besides pillars and doors. Also the player must complete the objectives such as picklocking doors, collecting notes about the story, power the generators to make his way.

 

Main Story 

"Beloved Firefighter" invites players to a deep emotional and psychological horror experience. Our main character, a respected firefighter in the city, is confronted with his past mistakes. After his ex-girlfriend was diagnosed with schizophrenia, he became emotionally lost and cheated on her. Months later, the betrayed ex-girlfriend, unable to cope with the betrayal, sets her own house on fire. The firefighter, in an attempt to save her, rushes into the flames, initiating a horror-filled rescue operation. Players will be drawn into both physical and psychological terror as they witness the firefighter confronting his past.
